Services: NestedObjectHelper

NestedObjectHelper

NestedObjectHelper()

Helper utility to simplify working with nested objects.

Source:
  • services/nested-object-helper.js, line 1

Methods

(static) flattenObjectKeys(object) → {Array}

Crawls an object and returns a flattened set of all attributes using dot notation. This converts an Object like: {foo: {bar: true}, baz: true} Into an Array like ['foo', 'foo.bar', 'baz']

Parameters:
Name Type Description
object Object

Object to be flattened
Source:
  • services/nested-object-helper.js, line 65
Returns:

Array of flattened keys (perhaps containing dot notation)

Type
Array

(static) readAttribute(object, attribute) → {Object}

Returns the value defined by the specified attribute. This function guards against dot notation for nested references (ex. 'foo.bar').

Parameters:
Name Type Description
object Object

Object ot be read
attribute String

Attribute (or dot-notation path) to read
Source:
  • services/nested-object-helper.js, line 105
Returns:

Value defined at the specified key

Type
Object

(static) writeAttribute(object, attribute, value)

Writes the specified value to the specified attribute. This function guards against dot notation for nested references (ex. 'foo.bar').

Parameters:
Name Type Description
object Object

Object ot be updated
attribute String

Attribute (or dot-notation path) to update
value Object

Value to be written
